display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a time. Damage: Extreme,
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery
display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.
